title: Remembering ‘Brother’ Max Cleland and his fellow veterans
description: Paul Rieckhoff, the founder of the Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America, joins Chuck to talk about the memory of Max Cleland and the challenges facing veterans today.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
